requirements.title: Commitment to Full Scope Coverage
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall explicitly confirm its ability and commitment to deliver the full scope of support activities.

requirements.title: Documentation Management
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall maintain a centralized and continuously updated knowledge base.

requirements.title: Service Coverage Periods
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall be able to ensure support coverage during the required periods.

requirements.title: Supported Languages
requirements.description: Support services shall be provided in both French and English.

requirements.title: Service Model
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall describe in detail its operating model.

requirements.title: Flexibility of the Model
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall demonstrate the ability to dynamically adjust its support capacity.

requirements.title: Governance Structure
requirements.description: Clear governance structure and reporting lines.

requirements.title: Workforce Stability
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall ensure workforce stability and the preservation of operational knowledge throughout the delivery of support services.

requirements.title: Organizational Structure
requirements.description: The Service Provider must provide a detailed description of its account management and oversight structure.

requirements.title: Governance
requirements.description: The Service Provider must formally confirm adherence to the minimum governance structure outlined above.

requirements.title: Reporting
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall define and implement a structured reporting approach to monitor the performance.

requirements.title: Tooling
requirements.description: The Service Provider must agree to use Accor's accounts and tooling as the primary operational environment.

requirements.title: Continuous Service Improvement
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall implement a proactive continuous improvement approach throughout the contract duration.

requirements.title: Innovation and Automation
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall remain up to date with relevant technological evolutions and AI tools.

requirements.title: Compliance with Service Levels
requirements.description: The Service Level Agreements represent the minimum expected service levels.

requirements.title: Modification of Service Levels
requirements.description: Service levels may evolve but only through enhancement, not reduction.

requirements.title: Service Penalty Models
requirements.description: A penalty system will be applied in case of SLA breaches.

requirements.title: Transition
requirements.description: The Service Provider shall propose a structured transition methodology.

requirements.title: Risk Management
requirements.description: The Service Provider must proactively manage risks to minimize disruptions.

requirements.title: Reversibility
requirements.description: The Contractor shall detail the reversibility approach and associated activities.

requirements.title: Objectives of the Pricing Model
requirements.description: The pricing model must enable cost optimization, quality-driven performance, and scalability.

requirements.title: Productivity Gains
requirements.description: Productivity gains shall be periodically assessed and reflected in the pricing model.
